#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 10000
int main()
{
    int t,i,j;
    long a[1001];
    a[0]=a[1]=1;
    for(i=2;i<1001;i++)
    {
        a[i]=0;
        int half=i/2;
        for(j=1;j<half;j++)
            a[i]=(a[i]+(a[j]*a[i-j]))%MOD;
        a[i]=(a[i]*2)%MOD;
        long x=(a[half]*a[i-half])%MOD;
        a[i]=(a[i]+x)%MOD;
        if(i%2)
            a[i]=(a[i]+x)%MOD;
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        printf("%ld\n",a[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
